refnamediv.refpurpose: Receives an audio signal from a Jack port.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in jacko. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Receives an audio signal from a Jack audio input port inside this instance of Csound, which in turn has received the signal from its connected external Jack audio output port.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ScsoundPortName -- The short name ("portname") of the internal Jack audio input port.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: asignal -- Audio received from the external Jack output port to which ScsoundPortName is connected.

refentry.note: works with an already running Jack daemon. Do not use -+rtaudio=jack in CsOptions
